H0.text: who has a ring of power in lotr. Galadriel

H1.text: who has a ring of power in lotr. Gandalf

H2.text: who has a ring of power in lotr. Elrond

H3.text: who has a ring of power in lotr. Sauron

A4.text: Knowing that its corrupting influence would make her 'great and terrible', and recalling the ambitions that had once brought her to Middle-earth, she refused the Ring.

A5.text: Elrond is the bearer of the elven-ring Vilya, the Ring of Air
